transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling product support. How may I assist you?

Customer: Yeah, hi. I'm really frustrated. I bought your wireless headphones three weeks ago and they keep disconnecting every few minutes. It's unusable.

Agent: I'm very sorry to hear you're experiencing that issue. That's definitely not the experience we want you to have. Let me help troubleshoot this. Have you tried resetting the headphones?

Customer: Yes, I've tried everything. I've reset them, updated the firmware, tried different devices. Nothing works.

Agent: I appreciate you trying those steps. Can I have your order number so I can look up your purchase?

Customer: It's ORD-445821.

Agent: Thank you. I see you purchased these on March 15th. Since troubleshooting hasn't resolved the issue and you're within our 30-day return window, I have two options for you. We can either send you a replacement pair with expedited shipping, or process a full refund.

Customer: Honestly, at this point I just want my money back. I don't trust this product anymore.

Agent: I completely understand. I'll process a full refund to your original payment method. You'll see it within 3-5 business days. I'll also email you a prepaid return shipping label. Just send the headphones back in any box.

Customer: Okay, that works. Will I get the full amount back?

Agent: Yes, you'll receive a full refund of $149.99. Is there anything else I can help you with?

Customer: No, that's it. Thanks for handling this quickly.

Agent: You're welcome, and again, I apologize for the inconvenience.
golden_summary: Customer reported wireless headphones purchased 3 weeks ago constantly disconnecting despite troubleshooting (reset, firmware update, multiple devices tested). Agent verified purchase (ORD-445821, March 15th) and offered replacement or refund within 30-day window. Customer declined replacement due to lost confidence in product. Agent processed full refund of $149.99 (3-5 business days) and provided prepaid return shipping label.

key_points: Defective wireless headphones with persistent disconnection issues
